## TocParameters.stimulateHashNavigation property

`toc` is run after component is mounted so if you do not provide yourself the id for the matching DOM element from the server side, browser won't automatically scroll this element into view. `stimulateHashNavigation` (defaults to `true`<!-- -->) will stimulate this behavior.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stimulateHashNavigation: boolean;
```
